Note.hint: Notes are for support materials you would like to share. You can add them as a link in the description along with an illustrative photo or simply as a photo when the notes are short. You can also put information about contact via chat and agreeing on the method of sharing notes, e.g. when you want to share notebooks.
Post.hint: The post should be about a specific problem or a one-time quick help. For example, with solving a task, explaining an issue or a question about the professors at the university.
Announcement.hint: The announcement should be about tutoring or a request for help in learning in a given field.
